death.attack.create.fan_fire: %1$s was burned to death by hot air
death.attack.create.fan_lava: %1$s was burned to death by lava fan
death.attack.create.saw: %1$s got cut in half by Mechanical Saw
death.attack.create.curse_polish: %1$s tried to polish a cursed item
death.attack.create.cuckoo_clock_explosi: %1$s was blown up by tampered cuckoo clock
create.gui.blockzapper.title: Handheld Blockzapper
create.gui.terrainzapper.title: Handheld Worldshaper
create.blockzapper.leftClickToSet: Left-Click a Block to set Material
create.gui.speed_gauge.title: Rotation Speed
create.gui.stress_gauge.title: Network Stress
create.gui.contraptions.not_fast_enough: It appears that this %1$s is _not_ rotating with _enough_ _speed_.
create.gui.contraptions.network_overstre: It appears that this contraption is _overstressed_. Add more sources or _slow_ _down_ the components with a high _stress_ _impact_.
create.gui.flexcrate.title: Adjustable Crate
create.gui.stockswitch.title: Stockpile Switch
create.gui.sequenced_gearshift.title: Sequenced Gearshift
create.schematicAndQuill.prompt: Enter a name for the Schematic:
create.schematic.invalid: [!] Invalid Item - Use the Schematic Table instead
create.schematic.tool.deploy.description: Moves the structure to a location.
Right-Click on the ground to place.
Hold [Ctrl] to select at a fixed distance.
create.schematic.tool.move.description.1: Point at the Schematic and [CTRL]-Scroll to push it.
create.schematic.tool.rotate.description: Rotates the Schematic around its center.
Instantly places the structure in the world.
[Right-Click] to confirm placement at the current location.
This tool is for Creative Mode only.
create.schematic.tool.flip.description.0: Flips the Schematic along the face you select.
create.schematic.tool.flip.description.1: Point at the Schematic and [CTRL]-Scroll to flip it.
create.schematics.maxAllowedSize: The maximum allowed schematic file size is:
create.gui.schematicTable.title: Schematic Table
create.gui.schematicannon.title: Schematicannon
create.gui.schematicannon.option.skipMis: If the cannon cannot find a required Block for placement, it will continue at the next Location.
create.gui.schematicannon.option.skipTil: The cannon will avoid replacing data holding blocks such as Chests.
create.gui.schematicannon.option.dontRep: The cannon will never replace any Solid blocks in its working area, only non-Solid and Air.
create.gui.schematicannon.option.replace: The cannon will only replace Solid blocks in its working area if the Schematic contains a solid Block at the Location.
The cannon will replace Solid blocks in its working area if the Schematic contains any Block at the Location.
The cannon will clear out all blocks in its working area, including those replaced by Air.
create.gui.filter.blacklist.description: Items pass if they do NOT match any of the above. An empty Blacklist accepts everything.
create.gui.filter.whitelist.description: Items pass if they match any of the above. An empty Whitelist rejects everything.
create.gui.filter.respect_data.descripti: Items only match if their durability, enchantments, and other attributes match as well.
create.gui.filter.ignore_data.descriptio: Items match regardless of their attributes.
create.gui.attribute_filter.whitelist_di: Items pass if they have any of the selected attributes.
create.gui.attribute_filter.whitelist_co: Items pass only if they have ALL of the selected attributes.
create.gui.attribute_filter.blacklist.de: Items pass if they do NOT have any of the selected attributes.
create.tooltip.randomWipDescription0: Please keep this item away from children.
create.tooltip.randomWipDescription1: A baby panda dies every time you use this item. Every. Time.
create.tooltip.randomWipDescription3: This is not the item you are looking for, *finger-wiggles* please disperse.
create.tooltip.randomWipDescription4: This item will self-destruct in 10 seconds. 10, 9, 8...
create.tooltip.randomWipDescription6: By using this item, you hereby consent to our disclaimer and agree to its terms.
create.tooltip.randomWipDescription7: This one maybe isn't for you. What about that one?
create.tooltip.randomWipDescription8: Use it and regret your decision immediately.
create.command.killTPSCommand.status.slo: [Create]: Server tick is currently slowed by %s ms :o
[Create]: Server tick is slowed by %s ms now >:)
[Create]: Server tick is back to regular speed :D
create.command.killTPSCommand.status.usa: [Create]: use /killtps stop to bring back server tick to regular speed
[Create]: use /killtps start <tickTime> to artificially slow down the server tick
advancement.create:root.desc: It's time to start building some amazing Contraptions!
advancement.create:andesite_alloy.desc: Create's materials have weird names, Andesite Alloy is one of them.
advancement.create:andesite_casing.desc: Use some Andesite, Meta, and Wood to create a basic Casing.
advancement.create:crushing_wheel.desc: Create some Crushing Wheels to break down materials.
advancement.create:rotation.desc: Watch your first kinetic component spin.
advancement.create:overstressed.desc: Experience the laws of physics firsthand.
advancement.create:sand_paper.desc: Create some Sand Paper to make things pretty.
Polish Rose Quartz until you can see through it.
advancement.create:sand_paper_secret.des: Use your Sand Paper to sand some Sand Paper.
advancement.create:press.desc: Make a Mechanical Press and use it to create some Plates.
advancement.create:brass.desc: Use Copper and Zinc to create some Brass.
advancement.create:brass_casing.desc: Use newly obtained Brass and some Wood to create a more advanced Casing.
advancement.create:deployer.desc: Create a Deployer, the perfect reflection of yourself.
advancement.create:chromatic_compound.de: Craft a Bar of Chromatic Compound.
advancement.create:shadow_steel.desc: Create Shadow Steel, a metal bar of nothingness.
advancement.create:refined_radiance.desc: Create Refined Radiance, a powerful chromatic substance.
advancement.create:refined_radiance_secr: Forged by the Beam of Light
Find the alternative way to make Refined Radiance.
advancement.create:speed_secret.desc: Watch a Speedometer reach exactly 69 rpm.
item.create.example_item.tooltip: EXAMPLE ITEM (just a marker that this tooltip exists)
item.create.example_item.tooltip.summary: A brief description of the item. _Underscores_ highlight a term.
item.create.example_item.tooltip.behavio: Then this item does this. (behaviours show on shift)
You can add as many behaviours as you like
item.create.symmetry_wand.tooltip.summar: Perfectly mirrors Block placement across configured planes.
item.create.placement_handgun.tooltip.su: Novel gadget for placing or exchanging blocks at a distance.
item.create.placement_handgun.tooltip.ac: Sets blocks placed by the tool to the targeted block.
item.create.terrain_zapper.tooltip.actio: Sets blocks placed by the tool to the targeted block.
Applies the currently selected _Brush_ and _Tool_ at the targeted location.
item.create.tree_fertilizer.tooltip.summ: A powerful combination of minerals suitable for speeding up the growth of common tree types.
item.create.deforester.tooltip.summary: A _radiant_ _axe_ able to chop down trees in a split second.
item.create.filter.tooltip.summary: _Controls_ _outputs_ and _inputs_ of logistical devices with more _precision_, matching them against a _set_ _of_ _items_ or several _nested_ _filters_.
item.create.property_filter.tooltip.summ: _Controls_ _outputs_ and _inputs_ of logistical devices with more _precision_, matching them against a _set_ _of_ item _attributes_ and _categories_.
block.create.cocoa_log.tooltip.summary: An augmented jungle log allowing for easier automation of _Cocoa_ _Beans_.
item.create.empty_blueprint.tooltip.summ: Used as a recipe ingredient and for writing at the _Schematic_ _Table_.
item.create.blueprint.tooltip.summary: Holds a structure to be positioned and placed into the world. Position the Hologram as desired and use a _Schematicannon_ to build it.
item.create.blueprint.tooltip.behaviour1: Can be positioned using the Tools on Screen.
Used for saving a Structure in your world to a .nbt file.
Select two corner points using R-Click.
_Ctrl-Scroll_ on the faces to adjust the size. R-Click again to Save.
Select a corner point / confirm save.
Select points in _mid-air_. _Scroll_ to adjust the distance.
block.create.creative_crate.tooltip.summ: Provides an endless supply of blocks to adjacent _Schematicannons_.
block.create.schematicannon.tooltip.summ: Shoots blocks to recreate a deployed _Schematic_ in the World. Uses items from adjacent Inventories and _Gunpowder_ as fuel.
block.create.schematic_table.tooltip.beh: Uploads a chosen File from your Schematics Folder.
block.create.cogwheel.tooltip.summary: _Relays_ _Rotation_ in a straight line, and to adjacent _Cogwheels_.
block.create.large_cogwheel.tooltip.summ: A larger version of the _Cogwheel_, allowing for _change_ in _Rotation_ _Speed_ when connected to its smaller Counterpart.
block.create.encased_shaft.tooltip.summa: _Relays_ _Rotation_ in a straight line. Suitable for propagating Rotation through Walls.
block.create.gearshift.tooltip.summary: A control to toggle rotation direction for connected shafts.
block.create.clutch.tooltip.summary: A control to engage/disengage rotation for connected shafts.
block.create.clutch.tooltip.behaviour1: _Stops_ conveying rotation to the other side.
block.create.encased_belt.tooltip.summar: _Relays_ _Rotation_ through its block and to attached _Encased_ _Belts_.
block.create.encased_belt.tooltip.behavi: Attached Blocks will have the exact _same_ _rotation_ _speed_ and direction. They do not have to face the same way.
block.create.adjustable_pulley.tooltip.s: _Relays_ _Rotation_ through its block and to attached _Encased_ _Belts_. Attached encased belts will _rotate_ _faster_ based on the _analog_ _redstone_ _signal_ this block receives.
block.create.adjustable_pulley.tooltip.b: Without a signal, it will _not_ _speed_ _up_ connected belts. With a full strength signal connected belt, speed _doubles_.
item.create.belt_connector.tooltip.summa: Connects two or more _Shafts_ with a _Mechanical_ _Belt_. Connected shafts will have the exact same rotation speed and direction. The Belt can act as a _Conveyor_ for _Items_ and _Entities_.
item.create.belt_connector.tooltip.actio: Selects the shaft as one pulley of the Belt. Both selected Shafts have to _line_ _up_ either _Vertically_, _Horizontally_, or _Diagonally_ toward the Belt's Direction.
_Resets_ the first selected position for the Belt.
item.create.goggles.tooltip.summary: A pair of glasses to augment your vision with useful _kinetic_ _information_.
item.create.goggles.tooltip.behaviour1: Shows _colored_ _indicators_ corresponding to the _Speed_ _Level_ of a placed kinetic component as well as _Stress_ _Impact_ and _Capacity_ of individual components.
item.create.goggles.tooltip.behaviour2: Shows detailed information about _Speed_ or _Stress_ of the network to which the gauge is connected.
item.create.wrench.tooltip.summary: A useful tool for working on kinetic contraptions. Can be used to _Rotate_, _Dismantle_ and to _Configure_ components.
item.create.wrench.tooltip.action1: _Rotates_ _components_ toward or away from the face with which you interacted.
block.create.encased_fan.tooltip.summary: Converts _Rotational_ _Force_ to _Air_ _Currents_ and back. Has a variety of uses.
block.create.encased_fan.tooltip.behavio: Provides _rotational_ _force_ from any _heat_ _sources_ immediately below itself. The fan has to be facing down.
_Pushes_ or _Pulls_ Entities, depending on the incoming Rotation speed.
_Liquids_ and _Fire_ particles are emitted into the air flow. This can be used to _process_ _items_.
block.create.nozzle.tooltip.summary: Attach to the front of an _Encased_ _Fan_ to distribute its effect on Entities in _all_ _directions_.
block.create.hand_crank.tooltip.summary: A simple _source_ of _Rotational_ _Force_ that requires the interaction of players.
block.create.hand_crank.tooltip.behaviou: Provides _Rotational_ _Force_ to an attached contraption. _Sneak_ _to_ _reverse_ the rotation.
block.create.cuckoo_clock.tooltip.summar: Fine craftsmanship for _decorating_ a space and _keeping_ _track_ _of_ _time_.
block.create.cuckoo_clock.tooltip.behavi: Shows the _current_ _time_ and plays a tune twice a day. _Activates_ once at _noon_ and at dusk, as soon as _players_ _can_ _sleep_.
block.create.millstone.tooltip.summary: A kinetic component suitable for _grinding_ inserted _materials_. Can be powered by an adjacent cogwheel or by connecting to the shaft at the bottom. Results have to be extracted from the component.
block.create.millstone.tooltip.behaviour: Starts applying _milling_ _recipes_ to any items inserted from the side or the top of the block.
block.create.crushing_wheel.tooltip.cond: When attached to other Crushing Wheel
block.create.crushing_wheel.tooltip.beha: Forms a crushing machine for processing a variety of things. The Wheels' teeth have to connect and moving with the _same_ _speed_ in _opposite_ _directions_.
block.create.mechanical_press.tooltip.su: A forceful piston for compressing items beneath it. Requires constant _Rotational_ _Force_.
block.create.mechanical_press.tooltip.be: _Starts_ to compress items dropped below it.
_Automatically_ compresses bypassing items on the Belt.
block.create.mechanical_mixer.tooltip.be: Starts to _compact_ _items_ in the basin whenever all necessary ingredients are present.
block.create.basin.tooltip.summary: A handy _item_ _container_ used in processing with the _Mechanical_ _Mixer_ and the _Mechanical_ _Press_. Supports _Redstone_ _Comparators_.
block.create.mechanical_mixer.tooltip.su: A kinetic whisk for applying any shapeless crafting recipes to items beneath it. Requires constant _Rotational_ _Force_ and a _Basin_ placed below (with a gap in between).
block.create.mechanical_mixer.tooltip.be: Starts to mix items in the basin whenever all necessary ingredients are present.
_Configures_ the minimum amount of _total_ _ingredients_ for applied recipes. Use this option to _rule_ _out_ _unwanted_ _recipes_ with similar but less ingredients.
A kinetic assembler for _automating_ any _shaped_ _crafting_ recipe. Place _multiple_ _in_ _a_ _grid_ corresponding to your recipe, and _arrange_ _their_ _belts_ to create a _flow_ that exits the grid on one of the crafters.
_Starts_ _the_ _crafting_ _process_ as soon as _all_ _crafters_ in the grid have been _given_ _an_ _item_.

_Cycles_ _the_ _direction_ an individual crafter _moves_ _its_ _items_ towards. To form a working grid, _arrange_ _the_ _belts_ _in_ _a_ _flow_ which moves all items towards a final crafter.  The final crafter must _point_ _away_ from the grid.
_Connects_ the _input_ _inventory_ of adjacent crafters. Use this to _combine_ _slots_ in the crafting grid and _save_ _on_ _input_ _work_.
block.create.furnace_engine.tooltip.summ: A powerful source of _Rotational_ _Power_ that requires a _running_ _furnace_ to work.
block.create.furnace_engine.tooltip.beha: _Starts_ _powering_ a _Flywheel_ placed in front of it (1m apart). Use a Blast Furnace for higher speeds.
block.create.flywheel.tooltip.summary: A large metal wheel to _harness_ _and_ _stabilize_ generated force by an _attached_ _Engine_. Flywheels connect to engines if they are _1m_ _apart_ and at a _90Â°_ _Angle_ from each other.
block.create.flywheel.tooltip.behaviour1: Provides _Rotational_ _Force_ to a connected contraption based on the generator's strength and speed.
A portable interchange point for _moving_ _items_ to and from a _structure_ moved by a piston, bearing, minecart, or pulley.

Interacts with stationary _transposers_ such that transposers _facing_ _away_ from the interface _pull_ _items_, and transposers targeting the interface will _insert_ _items_ from attached inventory. The contraption will briefly stall as items are exchanged.
block.create.rotation_speed_controller.t: A _configurable_ _relay_ able to speed up or slow down the target component to any desired speed.
Relays incoming rotational force to the wheel, trying to _match_ the _speed_ it is configured to target. The _cogwheel_ has to be _attached_ _on_ _top_ of the controller.
block.create.mechanical_piston.tooltip.s: A more advanced version of the _Piston.  It uses _Rotational_ _Force_ to precisely move attached structures. _Piston_ _Extension_ _Poles_ at the rear define the _Range_ of this Device. Without extensions, the piston will not move. Use _Chassis_ or _Slime_ _Blocks_ to move more than a single line of blocks.
block.create.mechanical_piston.tooltip.b: Starts moving the attached structure. Speed and direction correlate to incoming Rotation Speed.
block.create.sticky_mechanical_piston.to: A more advanced version of the _Sticky_ _Piston.  It uses _Rotational_ _Force_ to precisely move attached structures. _Piston_ _Extension_ _Poles_ at the rear define the _Range_ of this Device. Without extensions, the piston will not move. Use _Chassis_ or _Slime_ _Blocks_ to move more than a single line of blocks.
Starts moving the attached structure. Speed and direction correlate to the incoming Rotation Speed.
block.create.piston_pole.tooltip.behavio: Extends a piston's range by 1 block
Used for rotating _larger_ _structures_ or harnessing _Rotational_ _Force_ from wind.
Starts rotating attached blocks. Use _Chassis_ or _Slime_ _Blocks_ to move more than a single block.
Starts providing _Rotational_ _Force_ generated from the rotation of its attached structure. The Structure has to include suitable _Sail_ _Blocks_ (Currently any Wool Block).
block.create.clockwork_bearing.tooltip.s: An advanced version of the _Mechanical_ _Bearing_ for rotating up to two _clock_ _hands_ according to current _in-game_ _time_.
block.create.clockwork_bearing.tooltip.b: Starts rotating the attached Structure towards the _current_ _hour_. If an independent second structure exists in front of the first one, it will serve as the _minute_ _hand_.
block.create.sequenced_gearshift.tooltip: A _programmable_ _utility_ _component,_ which can change its _rotational_ _through-put_ according to up to _5_ _consecutive_ _instructions._ Use this to power Mechanical Bearings, Pistons or Pulleys with more control over timing and speed. May become less precise at higher speeds.
_Starts_ _executing_ programmed instructions based on the input speed.
block.create.cart_assembler.tooltip.summ: Mounts a connected Structure onto a _passing_ _Minecart_.
block.create.cart_assembler.tooltip.beha: _Disassembles_ mounted Structures of _passing_ _carts_ and places them back into the world.
block.create.rope_pulley.tooltip.summary: Moves attached _blocks_ and _structures_ _vertically_. Use _Chassis_ or _Slime_ _Blocks_ to move more than a single block.
block.create.rope_pulley.tooltip.behavio: Starts moving the attached structure. Speed and direction correlate to the incoming Rotation Speed.
block.create.translation_chassis.tooltip: A configurable base block connecting structures for movement.
_Moves_ all _attached_ _Chassis_ with the same orientation, and a column of Blocks within its range. Blocks will only be pulled if the chassis' face is _Sticky_ (See [Ctrl]).
Configure the _range_ for this chassis block. Hold CTRL to modify the range of all attached chassis blocks as well.
Makes the clicked face _Sticky_. When moved, the chassis will _pull_ attached Blocks, regardless of movement direction.
block.create.rotation_chassis.tooltip.su: A configurable base block connecting structures for movement.
block.create.rotation_chassis.tooltip.be: _Moves_ all _attached_ _Chassis_ in a column, and a cylinder of blocks around itself. Blocks around it are only moved when they are within range and attached to a sticky side (See [Ctrl]).
Configure the _range_ for this chassis block. Hold CTRL to modify the range of all attached chassis blocks as well.
block.create.rotation_chassis.tooltip.ac: Makes the clicked face _Sticky_. When Chassis move, all designated blocks attached to the sticky side are moved with it.
block.create.drill.tooltip.summary: A mechanical device suitable for _breaking_ _blocks_. It is movable with _Mechanical_ _Pistons_ or _Bearings_.
block.create.drill.tooltip.behaviour1: Acts as a _stationary_ Block Breaker. Also _hurts_ _entities_ in its effective area.
block.create.drill.tooltip.behaviour2: Breaks Blocks with which the drill collides.
block.create.harvester.tooltip.summary: A mechanical plant cutter suitable for medium scale crop automation. It is movable with _Mechanical_ _Pistons_ or _Bearings_.
block.create.harvester.tooltip.behaviour: _Harvests_ all _mature_ _crops_ which which the blade collides and reset them to their initial growth state.
block.create.saw.tooltip.summary: Suitable for _cutting_ _trees_ effectively and for _cutting_ _blocks_ into their carpentered counterparts. It is movable using _Mechanical_ _Pistons_ or _Bearings_.
block.create.saw.tooltip.behaviour1: Applies _Sawing_ and _Stonecutting_ _Recipes_ to items dropped onto or inserted into it. When multiple outputs are possible, it cycles through them unless a _filter_ is assigned.
block.create.saw.tooltip.behaviour2: _Breaks_ _logs_ in front of it. If the log supported a tree on its own, the _tree_ _will_ _collapse_ away from the saw.
block.create.saw.tooltip.behaviour3: _Cuts_ all _Trees_ with which the saw collides.
block.create.stockswitch.tooltip.summary: Toggles a Redstone signal based on the _Storage_ _Space_ in the attached Container.
block.create.stockswitch.tooltip.behavio: Starts providing _Redstone_ _Power_ until Lower Limit is reached again.
block.create.redstone_bridge.tooltip.sum: Endpoints for _Wireless_ _Redstone_ connections. Can be assigned _Frequencies_ using any item. Signal range is limited, though reasonably far.
block.create.redstone_bridge.tooltip.beh: Receiving Links of the same _Frequency_ will produce a Redstone signal.
block.create.redstone_bridge.tooltip.act: Sets the _Frequency_ to that item. A total of _two_ _different_ _items_ can be used in combination for defining a Frequency.
block.create.contact.tooltip.summary: Only emits redstone power in pairs. It is movable with _Mechanical_ _Pistons_ or _Bearings_.
block.create.contact.tooltip.behaviour2: Triggers all stationary Contacts it passes.
block.create.flexcrate.tooltip.summary: This _Storage_ _Container_ allows Manual control over its capacity. It can hold up to _16_ _Stacks_ of any Item. Supports _Redstone_ _Comparators_.
block.create.extractor.tooltip.summary: _Takes_ _Items_ from an attached _Inventory_ and drops them onto the ground. Will not drop Items unless the space is clear. Can be assigned an item-stack as a _filter_.
block.create.extractor.tooltip.behaviour: Extractors can pull items _from_ _belts_ reinforced with _brass_ _casing_. When the extractor is blocked, the _belt_ _will_ _stall_.
block.create.extractor.tooltip.action1: Assigns currently _held_ _stack_ as the _Filter_. The Extractor will pull the item _type_ and _count_ of the filter stack exclusively.
block.create.transposer.tooltip.summary: _Takes_ _items_ from an attached _Inventory_ and immediately puts them into the target _Inventory_. Can be assigned an item-stack as a _filter_.
block.create.transposer.tooltip.behaviou: Transposers can pull items _from_ _belts_ reinforced with _brass_ _casing_. When the transposer is backed up, the _belt_ _will_ _stall_.
block.create.transposer.tooltip.action1: Assigns currently _held_ _stack_ as the _Filter_. The Transposer will pull the item _type_ and _count_ of the filter stack exclusively.
block.create.deployer.tooltip.summary: _Punches_, _Uses_, and _Activates_. This machine will try to _imitate_ a _player_ as a much as possible. Can _Take_ and _Deposit_ _items_ in adjacent _Inventory_. Can be assigned an item-stack as a _filter_.
block.create.deployer.tooltip.behaviour1: Extends its arm and _activates_ in the block space _2m_ _ahead_ of itself.
block.create.deployer.tooltip.behaviour2: Toggles punch mode. In _punch_ _mode_, the Deployer will attempt to use its item to _break_ _blocks_ or _hurt_ _entities_.
block.create.linked_extractor.tooltip.su: _Takes_ _items_ from an attached _Inventory_ and drops them onto the ground. Will not drop Items unless the space is clear. Can be assigned an item-stack as a _filter_. Can be controlled remotely via a _Redstone_ _Link_.
block.create.linked_extractor.tooltip.ac: Assigns currently _held_ _stack_ as the _Filter_. The Extractor will pull the item _type_ and _count_ of the filter stack exclusively.
Assigns currently _held_ _item_ as part of the Frequency listened on. Whenever a transmitting _Redstone_ _Link_ of the same frequency is powered, this Extractor will pause.
block.create.linked_transposer.tooltip.s: _Takes_ _items_ from an attached _Inventory_ and immediately puts them into the target _Inventory_. Can be assigned an item-stack as a _filter_. Can be controlled remotely via a _Redstone_ _Link_.
block.create.linked_transposer.tooltip.a: Assigns currently _held_ _stack_ as the _Filter_. The Transposer will only pull items that match the item _type_ and _count_ of the filter stack.
Assigns the currently _held_ _item_ as part of the Frequency listened on. Whenever a transmitting _Redstone_ _Link_ of the same frequency is powered, this Transposer will pause.
block.create.belt_funnel.tooltip.summary: _Collects_ _incoming_ _items_ and inserts them into the attached _Inventory_ if possible. Can collect items in the _world_ and items on a _belt_.
block.create.belt_funnel.tooltip.behavio: Funnels can pull items _from_ _belts_ when placed above them, either sideways or at the end. When a side-ways funnel is backed up, items on the _belt_ _will_ _not_ _stall_.
block.create.belt_tunnel.tooltip.summary: An aesthetic option for running your _Mechanical_ _Belts_ through walls. Belts have to be reinforced with _Brass_ _Casing_. Tunnels can _synchronize_ with _their_ _neighbours_, only letting items pass if all tunnels in the group have one waiting. [Ctrl]
block.create.belt_tunnel.tooltip.action1: Toggles _synchronized_ _behaviour_. Synchronized tunnels hold items until their neighbours have an item as well.
block.create.belt_tunnel.tooltip.action2: _Adjusts_ _window_ _shutters_ if the tunnel has a window on that face.
block.create.brass_casing.tooltip.summar: Sturdy machine casing with a variety of uses. Safe for decoration.
block.create.brass_casing.tooltip.behavi: _Reinforces_ _belts_ with a brass foundation. Reinforced Belts can support _Belt_ _Tunnels_, _Extractors_, _Funnels_, and _Transposers_ interacting with the belt from the sides and below.
block.create.entity_detector.tooltip.sum: Detects items and entities passing by on a _Mechanical_ _Belt_ in front of it. Use a _Wrench_ to cycle its behaviour. Non-items will always be handled in detect mode regardless of the setting.
block.create.entity_detector.tooltip.beh: Provides redstone _while_ a _matching_ _item_ _is_ in the observed belt segment.
Emits a _pulse_ when a _matching_ _item_ _passes_ the center of the observed belt segment.
_Ejects_ _matching_ _items_ off the side. If the target belt or space is _occupied_, the item will be _held_ _in_ _place_.
_Splits_ a _matching_ _item_ _stack_ and _ejects_ _half_ of it off the side.
block.create.pulse_repeater.tooltip.summ: A simple circuit for cutting passing redstone signals to a length of _1_ _tick_.
block.create.flexpeater.tooltip.summary: An advanced _Redstone_ _Repeater_ with a _configurable_ _Delay_ up to 30 Minutes.
block.create.flexpulsepeater.tooltip.sum: A _Pulse_ _Repeater_ with a _configurable_ _Delay_ up to 30 Minutes.
block.create.analog_lever.tooltip.summar: A lever with more _precise_ _control_ over its emitted _signal_ _strength_.
block.create.toggle_latch.tooltip.summar: A lever that can be toggled by a _Redstone_ _Pulse_.
block.create.redstone_latch.tooltip.summ: A lever that can be controlled by _Redstone_ _Signals_. A signal on the _back_ _enables_ it, a signal from the _side_ _will_ _reset_ it.
block.create.speed_gauge.tooltip.summary: Measures and displays the _rotational_ _speed_ of attached kinetic components. Supports _Redstone_ _Comparators_.
block.create.speed_gauge.tooltip.behavio: Indicates a color corresponding to the level of speed. _Green_ indicates Slow, _Blue_ Moderate and _Purple_ Fast rotation. Some mechanical components require a sufficient level of speed to work properly.
block.create.stress_gauge.tooltip.summar: Measures and displays the _overall_ _stress_ of the attached kinetic network. Supports _Redstone_ _Comparators_.
block.create.stress_gauge.tooltip.behavi: Indicates a color corresponding to the level of stress. _Over-stressed_ _networks_ will cease to move. Stress can be relieved by adding more _rotational_ _sources_ to the network.
tool.create.sand_paper.tooltip.summary: A rough paper that can be used to _polish_ _materials_. Can be automatically applied using the Deployer.
tool.create.sand_paper.tooltip.behaviour: Applies polish to items held in the _offhand_ or lying on the _floor_ when _looking_ _at_ _them_
item.create.slot_cover.tooltip.summary: Used to mark a _Mechanical_ _Crafter_ as an empty slot in a recipe. Crafters do not necessarily have to form a full square grid. This is useful when there are recipes where _ingredients_ _are_ _diagonal_ to each other.
tool.create.shadow_steel.tooltip.summary: A fast and powerful tool that _destroys_ _drops_ from any block or entity. Killed mobs can drop _more_ _experience_ based on the _Looting_ modifier of this tool.
tool.create.blazing.tooltip.summary: This tool will _melt_ _broken_ _blocks_ and _ignite_ _attacked_ _mobs_. It will not lose Durability while being used in the _Nether_.
tool.create.rose_quartz.tooltip.summary: This tool grants you a _greater_ _reach_ for _breaking_ _blocks_ or _placing_ _blocks_ from the off-hand.
